evidence.text: COMPLAINT against Denka Performance Elastomer LLC, DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC (Filed on behalf of USA - Filing Fee not required) filed by United States of America.

extracted.value: Complaint filed by United States of America on 02/28/2023, asking the court to bring suit against Denka Performance Elastomer LLC and DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC.

evidence.text: MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by United States of America. Motion(s) will be submitted on 6/14/2023.

extracted.value: Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by United States of America on 06/14/2023, asking the court to grant a preliminary injunction to prevent Denka from disposing of certain assets.

evidence.text: EXPARTE/CONSENT MOTION for Leave to File Excess Pages for Preliminary Injunction by United States of America.

extracted.value: Expedited/Consent Motion for Leave to File Excess Pages for Preliminary Injunction filed by United States of America on 03/20/2023, requesting leave to file excess pages for the preliminary injunction motion.

evidence.text: EXPARTE/CONSENT MOTION to Seal Attachments to 9 MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by United States of America.

extracted.value: Expedited/Consent Motion to Seal Attachments to 9 Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by United States of America on 03/20/2023, requesting to file attachments under seal for the preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: *DEFICIENT* MOTION for Order Governing Proceedings Relating to Plaintiff's Motion for Preliminary Injunction (R. Doc. 9 ) by Denka Performance Elastomer LLC.

extracted.value: Motion to Continue Submission Date for Plaintiff's Motion for Preliminary Injunction and Set Reasonable Briefing Schedule filed by Denka Performance Elastomer LLC on 03/30/2023, requesting to continue the submission date for the preliminary injunction motion and set a briefing schedule.

evidence.source_document: Dupont Specialty Products USA, LLC's Rule 12(b)(1) and 12(b)(6) Motion to Dismiss
evidence.text: DUPONT SPECIALTY PRODUCTS USA, LLC’S RULE 12 (b)(1) and 12(b)(6) MOTION TO DISMISS ... DuPont is entitled to entry of a judgment dismissing all of Plaintiff’s claims against it, as a matter of law.

extracted.value: Rule 12(b)(1) and 12(b)(6) Motion to Dismiss filed by DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC on 05/02/2023, asking the court to dismiss all claims against it for lack of subject matter jurisdiction and failure to state a claim.
